Brief description: 80 high-resolution aerial images with spatial resolution ranging from 0.3 to 1.0.
Creator: J. Yuan et al.

Brief description: Multiple labeled training and evaluation datasets of aerial images of crowds.
Preprocessing: Images manually labeled to show paths of individuals through crowds.
Creator: M. Butenuth et al.

Brief description: Remote sensing data of diseased trees and other land cover.
Creator: B. Johnson

Brief description: Maritime scenes of optical aerial images from the visible spectrum. It contains color images in dynamic marine environments, each image may contain one or multiple targets in different weather and illumination conditions.
Creator: A.-J. Gallego et al.

Brief description: Satellite imagery of forests in Japan.
Creator: B. Johnson

Brief description: Annotated overhead imagery. Images with multiple objects.
Preprocessing: Over 30 annotations and over 60 statistics that describe the target within the context of the image.
Creator: F. Tanner et al.

Brief description: SpaceNet is a corpus of commercial satellite imagery and labeled training data.
Preprocessing: GeoTiff and GeoJSON files containing building footprints.
Creator: DigitalGlobe, Inc.

Brief description: These images were manually extracted from large images from the USGS National Map Urban Area Imagery collection for various urban areas around the US.
Preprocessing: This is a 21 class land use image dataset meant for research purposes. There are 100 images for each class.
Format: Image chips of 256x256, 30 cm (1 foot) GSD
Creator: Yi Yang and Shawn Newsam

Brief description: Images were extracted from the National Agriculture Imagery Program (NAIP) dataset.
Preprocessing: SAT-4 has four broad land cover classes, includes barren land, trees, grassland and a class that consists of all land cover classes other than the above three.
Creator: S. Basu et al.

Brief description: Images were extracted from the National Agriculture Imagery Program (NAIP) dataset.
Preprocessing: SAT-6 has six broad land cover classes, includes barren land, trees, grassland, roads, buildings and water bodies.
Creator: S. Basu et al.
